name: ckd-prediction-tool
description: Chronic Kidney Disease Prediction Tool with Capacitor

scripts.build: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm cache clean --force && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && mkdir -p www && cp src/index.html www/ && cp -r src/assets www/
scripts.mobile:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.mobile:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
